contentrichtext.text: '''Michael Hastings''' or '''Mike Hastings''' may refer to: *[[Michael Hastings (playwright)]] (1938–2011), British playwright, screen-writer, novelist and poet *[[Michael Abney-Hastings, 14th Earl of Loudoun]] (1942–2012), British-born Australian farmer, alleged to be the rightful monarch of England *[[Michael Hastings, Baron Hastings of Scarisbrick]], British peer and television executive *[[Mike Hastings (ice hockey)]] (born 1966), former head coach and general manager of the Omaha Lancers in the USHL *[[Michael Hastings (journalist)]] (1980–2013), American journalist and writer *[[Michael Hastings (politician)]], State Senator, Illinois State Senate {{hndis|Hastings, Michael}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Hastings, Michael}}
